meanings.definition: The quality of being stubborn or obstinate.
meanings.sent1: Her pigheadedness made it difficult to change her mind.
meanings.sent2: His pigheadedness caused him to refuse any compromise.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pigheadedness, we couldn't help but admire his determination.
meanings.sent4: The pigheadedness of the old oak tree refusing to bend to the wind was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The pigheadedness of the toddler insisting on wearing mismatched socks was endearing.

meanings.sent1: The boss's pigheadedness led to many disagreements in the office.
meanings.sent2: She dealt with his pigheadedness by calmly presenting her arguments.
meanings.sent3: Despite his pigheadedness, he always had a way of making us laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her pigheadedness was like a brick wall, impossible to break through.
meanings.sent5: The pigheadedness of the mule was legendary in the small town.
